H0.text: What US city is called in Spanish 'The Meadows'. Sacramento

H1.text: What US city is called in Spanish 'The Meadows'. Denver

H2.text: What US city is called in Spanish 'The Meadows'. Tucson

H3.text: What US city is called in Spanish 'The Meadows'. Vegas

A4.text: The Spanish 'las vegas' or 'the meadows' (more precisely, lower land near a river) in English, was applied to describe the fertile lowlands near the springs.
